--> SHADOW IS THE ORIGINAL AUTHOR OF THIS MEGAPATCH: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2139417581]SEE HERE FOR ORIGINAL AND MORE DETAIL[/url]
[b]Currently contains patches for:[/b] Alpha Biomes Forsakens Growable Neutroamine [FSF] Growable Ambrosia [FSF] Growable Mushrooms Materials+ Pawnmorpher Vanilla Factions Expanded - Settlers Vanilla Factions Expanded - Medieval Vanilla Factions Expanded - Insectoids Vanilla Cooking Expanded Vanilla Cooking Expanded - Sushi Vanilla Brewing Expanded Vanilla Brewing Expanded - Coffees and Teas Vanilla Plants Expanded More Hydroponic Crops (Continued) Cultured Meat Medical IV's Lanius race Remote Tech ReGrowth: Boreal Forest Expansion ReGrowth: Tundra Expansion ReGrowth: Desert Expansion ReGrowth: Temperate Forest Expansion ReGrowth: Cold Bog Expansion ReGrowth: Wastelands Realistic Planets - Fan Update Combat Extended Survivalist Additions
[b]Note[/b]: This is now on GitHub, so if you wish to help contribute, please(!) submit a PR here: [url=https://github.com/dzfischer/SeedsPleaseMegaPatchProject]SeedsPleaseMegaPatchProject Repository[/url].
